verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* by his own \w standard|strong="H1714"\w*, with the \w ensign|strong="H0226"\w* of their \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: far \w off|strong="H5048"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* shall they \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft far…: Heb. over against\f*

And on the east \w side|strong="H6924"\w* toward the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the sun shall they of the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* throughout their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w* \add shall be\add* \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* threescore and \w fourteen|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And those that do \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* next unto him \add shall be\add* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*: and \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuar|strong="H6686"\w* \add shall be\add* \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* thereof, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\add Then\add* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*: and \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w* \add shall be\add* \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* thereof, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

All that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, throughout their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*. These shall \w first|strong="H7223"\w* set \w forth|strong="H5265"\w*.

¶ On the south \w side|strong="H8486"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Elizur|strong="H0468"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* thereof, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And those which \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* by him \add shall be\add* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

Then the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft Reuel: also called, Deuel\f*

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

All that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, throughout their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*. And they shall set \w forth|strong="H5265"\w* in the second \w rank|strong="H8145"\w*.

¶ Then the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* shall set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w* with the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: as they \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w*, so shall they set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w place|strong="H3027"\w* by their \w standards|strong="H1714"\w*.

¶ On the west \w side|strong="H3220"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And by him \add shall be\add* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Gamaliel|strong="H1583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedahzur|strong="H6301"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

Then the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Abidan|strong="H0027"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gideoni|strong="H1441"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

All that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, throughout their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*. And they shall go \w forward|strong="H5265"\w* in the third \w rank|strong="H7992"\w*.

¶ The \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \add shall be\add* on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* by their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammishaddai|strong="H5996"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And those that \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* by him \add shall be\add* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Pagiel|strong="H6295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ocran|strong="H5918"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Then the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*: and the \w captain|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Ahira|strong="H0299"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Enan|strong="H5881"\w*.

And his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

All they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*. They shall \w go|strong="H5265"\w* \w hindmost|strong="H0314"\w* with their \w standards|strong="H1714"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* those which were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: all those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* throughout their \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

But the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* were not \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: so they \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* by their \w standards|strong="H1714"\w*, and so they set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.
